item.description:
The Rhode Island National air Guard has an annual open house with the Blue Angels as well as other performers and static displays. Mike Goulian will be there.

Should be very good day. We need to plan our arrival with Landmark aviation. Easy enough. Sign up early.

KOQU in Kingston RI is the location.

Q - Is there a provision for privately owned aircraft to park?
A - All civilian aircraft would need to coordinate with Landmark Aviation at www.landmarkaviation.com prior to the show.

Some performers are listed here.

USN Blue Angels
Sean D. Tucker
Michael Goulian
John Klatt - Air National Guard
The Red Bull Air Force
The Red Bull Aerobatic Helicopter
Pietsch Air Shows
Geico Skytypers
USASOC Jump Team - The Black Daggers
Combined Arms Demo w/ Rich's Incredible Pyro
F-16 Viper Demo
C-130J Super Hercules
The Horsemen F-4U Corsair and F-8 Bearcat Demo
F-22 Raptor
USAF Heritage Flight
Rob Reider - Air Show Announcer
Mach 1 Productions - Dan McLaren

 

Flying in? Please note: or flying in to be a spectator of the show? If it's as a spectator then you need to call 401-295-5020 and speak with Kara or Pamela in customer service. They will need to know type aircraft and how many, date and time of arrival/departure and required fuel. Be aware because of the show schedule there will be blocked times that will not allow for private aircraft arrivals and departures. Kara and Pamela can help you with any questions you may have. Thanks Steve Steve Tibbetts General Manager Landmark Aviation RI (O) 401-295-5020 (C) 401-639-9043 (E) steve.tibbetts@landmarkaviation.com

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Blue Angels in RI at Quonset Open House
